arts.ttl: 10-time French champion Saint-Etienne opposes government's plan to disband fan groups
arts.sum: The club sided with its fans and said it opposes the government’s planned measure, “deeming it disproportionate and ineffective in the fight against violence and discrimination in stadiums. Saint-Etienne supporters were banned by French authorities from traveling to Montpellier for Sunday’s Ligue 1 game between the two relegation-threatened clubs because of a high risk of violence.

arts.ttl: Preview: Montpellier HSC vs. Saint-Etienne - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Montpellier HSC and Saint-Etienne, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
